title: AI Applications for Education
subtitle: Explore our collection of AI tools for interactive learning.

youModerate.title: You Moderate
youModerate.description: Converse with AI characters based on Wikipedia content, transforming educational topics into interactive conversations.

doppiaIntervista.title: Double Interview
doppiaIntervista.description: Interact simultaneously with two historical figures in parallel conversations, creating a unique educational dialogue.

wikiChatbot.title: WikiChat AI
wikiChatbot.description: Chat with an artificial intelligence representing any Wikipedia topic, perfect for interactive educational insights.

personaggioMisterioso.title: Guess the Mystery Character
personaggioMisterioso.description: Challenge the AI by asking questions to guess the chosen historical figure. You have a limited number of questions to discover the mysterious identity!

promptEngineer.title: Teaching Prompt Creator
promptEngineer.description: Help teachers and students create effective prompts for artificial intelligence in educational and learning activities.

convinciTu.title: Convince YOU
convinciTu.description: Challenge your persuasion skills by trying to convince historical figures of your ideas.

impersonaTu.title: You Impersonate
impersonaTu.description: Dialogue with a historical figure by interpreting another. Test your empathy skills!

inquiryDialogue.title: Inquiry Dialogue
inquiryDialogue.description: Moderate discussions between historical figures and develop critical thinking through guided inquiry.

aiIdentity.title: AI Identity
aiIdentity.description: Discover character identities through dialogue. Interact with two characters and guess who they are!
